name: Amazing Search(Amazon Product Searcher)
author: CodeRockz

sections.description:
Amazing Search is a WordPress plugin that gives you Amazon product search facility via an widget and shortcode for content with your affiliate link. It has a lot of customization option that you will surprise how easy to put an Amazon affiliate link in Amazon product search. Amazing Search follows all the rules and guidelines of Amazon, so you will never get an unwanted ban from Amazon.

Free version must need the Amazon API Key & Secret and only the content shortcode is available for free version

Premium Version also works without any Amazon API keys & secret

Premium Version also has advanced search Widget and many other options available for content shortcode

To see live demo of Premium Version click here

shortcode for searchbar

Use [amazing_search] shortcode into your content.

Major Features

1. Lightweight

2. Easy To Use

3. Follow The Guideline

4. True Link Localization

5. Fully Responsive

6. Regular Updates

7. Online documentation

8. Compatible with all WordPress theme

9. Automated Data Updates

10. Customer Satisfaction<h3>Support</h3>

To make your journey with us more easier & error free, We’ve a dedicated team. So, if you use our plugin or facing any problem feel free to contact with us by emailing here: support@coderockz.com.
sections.installation:
Before installing the plugin please make sure that

  1. Your php version is 5.4 or greater
  2. WordPress version is 3.6 or greater

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload amazing-search.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Select ‘Amazing Search’ from admin menu and setup the necessary settings
  4. use our shortcode and widget.
  5. Done!
sections.faq:
What is the difference between free and premium version?

Checkout the live demo and you will clearly understand what’s the difference between free and premium version. To see Live Demo click here

Do I need Amazon Access Keys & Secret?

If you are using the free version then the answer is YES and if you are using our premium version the answer is NO.

Where can I get live demo of Amazing Search?

You can see the live demo from here

  • Fixed: Amazon product review and rating bug fixed.

1.0.1

  • Fixed: Console error childWidth bug fixed.

1.0.0

  • First Release.
